text: Lights on the River () is a 1953 Soviet children's comedy movie directed by Viktor Eisymont.Огни на реке (1953) It stars Valery Pastukh, Nina Shorina, and Aleksandr Kopelev. == Actors == * Valery Pastukh as Kostya * Nina Shorina as Nyura * Aleksandr Kopelev as Misha * Fedya Severin as Timosha * Lyosha Kozlovsky as Yegorka == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1953 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Viktor Eisymont
title: Lights on the River
